data.name: Mitos y Leyendas Online
data.detailed_description:
Myths & Legends


With over 17 years on the market, Mitos y Leyendas a real life Trading Card Game has been a solid alternative to play with friends.

Gameplay


In simple steps:
  • Select a Demo Deck
  • Wait for another player to join you
  • Play your cards
  • Destroy her/his Castle

Currently with 260 unique cards in just a few (for now) Demo Decks you can play with anyone else playing the game at the moment.
Careful on what damage you choose to take, your castle is your deck, each damage point you take is a card that goes right to your graveyard.

Features

  • 260 Cards at the moment. more than 6000 to go (see IRL cards).
  • 4 Demo Decks for you to try an small portion of the archetypes you could play in M&L.
  • Build your own strategy deck.**
  • Customize your battlefield, be an European medieval Queen/King, an Egyptian Pharaoh, a Viking? you can customize the look of your battlefield as you like.**
  • Transmute your cards to create new ones and experience more and exiting abilities**

**: Feature still on development

Card Types

  • Allies are warrior cards used to defend your Castle-Deck or to attack your opponent's Castle. An Ally cannot attack unless it has been in play for at least one turn. However, you can always use it to either block or activate its abilities.
  • Totems are cards that grant specific abilities. The card's abilities can usually be activated as long as the Totem remains in the battlefield.
  • Talismans are one-time use cards with specific effects.
  • Weapons are equipped by Allies already in play. Only one Weapon may be attached to an Ally at any time, and once attached to an Ally, a Weapon cannot be removed or transferred to another Ally. They usually provide a Strength bonus and/or an effect
  • Gold cards are the resource used by players to play cards. Players begin the game with one Gold Card in play, and can add a gold card to their Gold Reserve each turn.


-----

Battle other Guardians online leading your favorite mythological, historical and literary characters in this adaptation of the popular TCG game Myths and Legends.
Collect the cards, build the perfect strategy and crush your enemies, share your triumphs and win amazing prices.

Myths and Legends Online.

data.short_description: Battle other Guardians leading your favorite mythological, historical and literary characters in this adaptation of the popular TCG game Myths and Legends. Collect the cards, build the perfect strategy and crush your enemies.
data.supported_languages: Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, English

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 | 8 | 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.0Ghz or superior
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64bits Windows 7 | 8 | 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.4Ghz or superior
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 10+ Series, RX 570+, R9 390+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13.6 or newer
  • Processor: i5 2.4Ghz or superior
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD GCN-based GPU, Nvidia Kepler-based GPU or newer, Intel HD 4000 or newer (requires Metal)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card:

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the card's art and/or illustrations might be considered mature in some countries or cultures.
